titleStmt.title: By the King a license for a collection throughout England and Wales, towards the maintenance of the exiled ministers of the Palatinate.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Arms, with leaf under lion's leg, and crowned initials "C R" at top.
"Witnesse Our Selfe at Canbury, the nineteenth day of August, in the sixth yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Guildhall Library (London, England).
